verses.verse: Now these are the last<WH314> words<WH1697> of David.<WH1732> David<WH1732> the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> says,<WH5002> the man<WH1397> who was raised<WH6965> on high<WH5920> says,<WH5002> the anointed<WH4899> of the God<WH430> of Jacob,<WH3290> the sweet<WH5273> psalmist<WH2158> of Israel:<WH3478>
"The Spirit<WH7307> of Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> by me.<WH4405> His word was on my tongue.<WH3956>

The God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> said,<WH559> the Rock<WH6697> of Israel<WH3478> spoke<WH1696> to me,<WH4910> 'One who rules over men<WH120> righteously,<WH6662> who rules<WH4910> in the fear<WH3374> of God,<WH430>

shall be as the light<WH216> of the morning,<WH1242> when the sun<WH8121> rises,<WH2224> a morning<WH1242> without<WH3808> clouds,<WH5645> when the tender grass<WH1877> springs out of the earth,<WH776> through clear shining<WH5051> after rain.<WH4306>'

Most certainly my house<WH1004> is not so with God,<WH410> yet he has made<WH7760> with me an everlasting<WH5769> covenant,<WH1285> ordered<WH6186> in all things,<WH8104> and sure, for it is all my salvation,<WH3468> and all my desire,<WH2656> although he doesn't<WH6779> make it grow.
But all of the ungodly<WH1100> shall be as thorns<WH6975> to be thrust away,<WH5074> because they can't<WH3947> be taken with the hand,<WH3027>

But the man<WH376> who touches<WH5060> them must be armed<WH4390> with iron<WH1270> and the staff<WH6086> of a spear.<WH2595> They shall be utterly<WH8313> burned<WH8313> with fire<WH784> in their place.<WH7675>"

These are the names<WH8034> of the mighty men<WH1368> whom David<WH1732> had:<WH7675> Josheb Basshebeth a<WH3427> Tahchemonite,<WH8461> chief<WH7218> of the captains;<WH7991> the same was Adino<WH5722> the Eznite,<WH6112> against eight<WH8083> hundred<WH3967> slain<WH2491> at one<WH259> time.<WH6471>

After<WH310> him was Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Dodai<WH1734> the son of an Ahohite,<WH266> one of the three<WH7969> mighty men<WH1368> with David,<WH1732> when they defied<WH2778> the Philistines<WH6430> who were there gathered together<WH622> to battle,<WH4421> and the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> were gone away.<WH5927>

He arose,<WH6965> and struck<WH5221> the Philistines<WH6430> until<WH3588> his hand<WH3027> was weary,<WH3021> and his hand<WH3027> froze<WH1692> to the sword;<WH2719> and Yahweh<WH3068> worked<WH6213> a great<WH1419> victory<WH8668> that day;<WH3117> and the people<WH5971> returned<WH7725> after<WH310> him only to take spoil.<WH6584>

After<WH310> him was Shammah<WH8048> the son<WH1121> of Agee<WH89> a Hararite.<WH2043> The Philistines<WH6430> were gathered together<WH622> into a troop,<WH2416> where there was a plot<WH2513> of ground<WH7704> full<WH4392> of lentils;<WH5742> and the people<WH5971> fled<WH5127> from<WH6440> the Philistines.<WH6430>
But he stood<WH3320> in the midst<WH8432> of the plot,<WH2513> and defended<WH5337> it,<WH5221> and killed the Philistines;<WH6430> and Yahweh<WH3068> worked<WH6213> a great<WH1419> victory.<WH8668>

Three<WH7969> of the thirty<WH7970> chief<WH7218> men went down,<WH3381> and came<WH935> to David<WH1732> in the harvest time<WH7105> to the cave<WH4631> of Adullam;<WH5725> and the troop<WH2416> of the Philistines<WH6430> was encamped<WH2583> in the valley<WH6010> of Rephaim.<WH7497>
David<WH1732> was then in the stronghold;<WH4686> and the garrison<WH4673> of the Philistines<WH6430> was then in Bethlehem.<WH1035>
David<WH1732> longed,<WH183> and said,<WH559> "Oh that one would give me water<WH4325> to drink<WH8248> of the well<WH953> of Bethlehem,<WH1035> which is by the gate!<WH8179>"

The three<WH7969> mighty men<WH1368> broke through<WH1234> the army<WH4264> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and drew<WH7579> water<WH4325> out of the well<WH953> of Bethlehem,<WH1035> that was by the gate,<WH8179> and took<WH5375> it,<WH935> and brought it to David:<WH1732> but he would<WH14> not drink<WH8354> of it,<WH5258> but poured it out to Yahweh.<WH3068>

He said,<WH559> "Be it far<WH2486> from me,<WH3068> Yahweh, that I should do<WH6213> this!<WH1818> Isn't it the blood of the men<WH582> who went<WH1980> in jeopardy of their lives?<WH5315>" Therefore he would<WH14> not drink<WH8354> it.<WH7969> The three mighty men<WH1368> did these things.<WH6213>

Abishai,<WH52> the brother<WH251> of Joab,<WH3097> the son<WH1121> of Zeruiah,<WH6870> was chief<WH7218> of the three.<WH7992> He lifted up<WH5782> his spear<WH2595> against three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and killed<WH2491> them,<WH8034> and had a name among the three.<WH7969>
Wasn't<WH3513> he most honorable of the three?<WH7969> therefore he was made their captain:<WH8269> however he didn't<WH935> attain to the three.<WH7969>

Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada,<WH3077> the son<WH1121> of a valiant<WH2428> man<WH376> of Kabzeel,<WH6909> who had done mighty<WH7227> deeds,<WH6467> he killed<WH5221> the two<WH8147> sons<WH739> of Ariel of Moab:<WH4124> he went down<WH3381> also and killed<WH5221> a lion<WH738> in the midst<WH8432> of a pit<WH953> in time<WH3117> of snow.<WH7950>

He killed<WH2026> an Egyptian,<WH4713> a goodly<WH4758> man:<WH376> and the Egyptian<WH4713> had a spear<WH2595> in his hand;<WH3027> but he went down<WH3381> to him with a staff,<WH7626> and plucked<WH1497> the spear<WH2595> out of the Egyptian<WH4713>'s hand,<WH3027> and killed<WH5221> him with his own spear.<WH2595>
Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077> did<WH6213> these things,<WH8034> and had a name among the three<WH7969> mighty men.<WH1368>
He was more honorable<WH3513> than the thirty,<WH7970> but he didn't<WH935> attain to the three.<WH7969> David<WH1732> set<WH7760> him over his guard.<WH4928>
Asahel<WH6214> the brother<WH251> of Joab<WH3097> was one of the thirty;<WH7970> Elhanan<WH445> the son<WH1121> of Dodo<WH1734> of Bethlehem,<WH1035>
Shammah<WH8048> the Harodite,<WH2733> Elika<WH470> the Harodite,<WH2733>
Helez<WH2503> the Paltite,<WH6407> Ira<WH5896> the son<WH1121> of Ikkesh<WH6142> the Tekoite,<WH8621>
Abiezer<WH44> the Anathothite,<WH6069> Mebunnai<WH4012> the Hushathite,<WH2843>
Zalmon<WH6756> the Ahohite,<WH266> Maharai<WH4121> the Netophathite,<WH5200>
Heleb<WH2460> the son<WH1121> of Baanah<WH1196> the Netophathite,<WH5200> Ittai<WH863> the son<WH1121> of Ribai<WH7380> of Gibeah<WH1390> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144>
Benaiah<WH1141> a Pirathonite,<WH6553> Hiddai<WH1914> of the brooks<WH5158> of Gaash.<WH1608>
Abialbon<WH45> the Arbathite,<WH6164> Azmaveth<WH5820> the Barhumite,<WH1273>
Eliahba<WH455> the Shaalbonite,<WH8170> the sons<WH1121> of Jashen,<WH3464> Jonathan,<WH3083>
Shammah<WH8048> the Hararite,<WH2043> Ahiam<WH279> the son<WH1121> of Sharar<WH8325> the Ararite,<WH2043>
Eliphelet<WH467> the son<WH1121> of Ahasbai,<WH308> the son<WH1121> of the Maacathite,<WH4602> Eliam<WH463> the son<WH1121> of Ahithophel<WH302> the Gilonite,<WH1526>
Hezro<WH2695> the Carmelite,<WH3761> Paarai<WH6474> the Arbite,<WH701>
Igal<WH3008> the son<WH1121> of Nathan<WH5416> of Zobah,<WH6678> Bani<WH1137> the Gadite,<WH1425>
Zelek<WH6768> the Ammonite,<WH5984> Naharai<WH5171> the Beerothite,<WH886> armor bearers<WH5375> to Joab<WH3097> the son<WH1121> of Zeruiah,<WH6870>
Ira<WH5896> the Ithrite,<WH3505> Gareb<WH1619> the Ithrite,<WH3505>
Uriah<WH223> the Hittite:<WH2850> thirty<WH7970> - seven in all.<WH7651>
